resources.string: Allow this app to use API which requires app is system app or have system signature (require root permission or start server with adb first).
Allow this app to receive a broadcast when task stack changed.
Tap to check if server is running
running, but no correct token received\ntap to request token
Server will be started automatically when other apps try to use it.

Your device is running Android Lollipop. According to some usersâ€™ feedback, the ADB shell may not have the permission to call certain APIs like some AppOps related APIs.

You will have to re-execute following steps every time you reboot your device.

Type following content into terminal and hit Enter

adb shell sh /sdcard/Android/data/moe.shizuku.privileged.api/files/start.sh

The server running status will refresh if this operation succeed
Allow %1$s use APIs with the identity of %2$s?
Shizuku Manager haven\'t received token correctly, please try restart server or use \"get token\" in the manager.
Due to some reason such as abnormal reboot, restart server is required.
Can\'t connect to server, please check if the server is running.
